Author: goldmetalflowers
Text: Give her a heartfelt apology, sheâ€™ll understand.    Maybe try journaling or an art/craft or other hobby where you can let out your emotions and deal with them in a healthier way?    If you start feeling like that again, remove yourself from the situation and take some time to calm down through breathing exercises or music until you feel a bit better    I hope you feel better, honey

Author: Chibi-Bunny
Text: Hey, I feel this. Eating disorders turn us into monsters, I've definitely done things I'm not proud of when mine takes over. It doesn't make you a bad person - it's the actions you take next that show what kind of person you are. Don't blame yourself, just own up and apologize. You're not a bad person I promise, you just have a bad disease
